content:
EditingState Enum

Definition

Enumerates the possible states of editing an expression in an expression text box.

In this Article

public enum EditingState
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
EditingState

Fields

Editing

Specifies the editing state for an expression.
Idle

Specifies the idle state in editing an expression.
Validating

Specifies the validating state in editing an expression.
